specials.name: Stench
specials.description: 10 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or become sickened 1 (plus slowed 1 as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, the creature takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

specials.name: Cleave
specials.description: Trigger Naghut kills or knocks a creature to 0 Hit Points Effect Naghut makes a melee strike against a second foe.

specials.name: Consume Flesh
specials.description: Requirements Naghut is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. Effect Naghut devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 4d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

specials.name: Ghast Fever
specials.description: Saving Throw Fortitude DC 24; Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day); Stage 2 4d8 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day); Stage 4 4d8 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day); Stage 6 dead, and rises as a ghast the next midnight

specials.name: Paralysis
specials.description: Any living creature (including elves) hit by Naghut's attack must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or become paralyzed. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

specials.name: Rage
specials.description: As the barbarian class ability; AC 23, +12 Hit Points, +6 melee damage

specials.name: Swift Leap
specials.description: Naghut jumps up to half her Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

strikes.name: jaws
strikes.damage: 2d6+12 piercing plus ghast fever and paralysis
